meanings.definition: A type of protein found in muscle tissue that plays a role in muscle contraction.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study myosins to understand how muscles work.
meanings.sent3: The myosins in the gym equipment decided to take a break.
meanings.sent4: The myosins in the muscle fibers are like tiny workers pulling on ropes.
meanings.sent5: The myosins are like little engines powering muscle movement.

meanings.definition: The plural form of myosin, a type of protein found in muscle tissue.
meanings.sent1: Many myosins work together in muscle cells.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need a lot of myosins to keep their muscles strong.
meanings.sent3: The group of myosins gathered for a protein party.
meanings.sent4: In the muscle army, myosins are the soldiers marching in unison.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the myosins look like a bustling city of activity.
